This page contains an outline of the topics and content for the workshop.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(googlesheets4)
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)
gs4_deauth()
d <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11tb2jW7HlPdS2nSWaUBaJrUZQ-7ljlqasDmHtXBSwqM/edit?usp=sharing")
```

```{r}
#| echo: false

d |>
  mutate(
    date = as.Date(date)
  ) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_date(date, date_style = 31) |>
  sub_missing(columns = c(day, what, topic), missing_text = "") |>
  cols_align(
    align = "center", 
    columns = c(day)
    ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "right", 
    columns = c(date)
    ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "left", 
    columns = c(what, topic)
    ) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_borders(
      sides = "right",
      color = "#D3D3D3",
      style = "solid"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = c(date, topic)
    )
  ) |>
  fmt_markdown(
    columns = c(topic, prepare)
  ) |>
  cols_width(
    week ~ px(30),
    date ~ px(200), 
    due ~ px(150),
    topic ~ px(400),
    topic ~ px(300),
    due ~ px(200)
  ) |>
  cols_label(
    what = "Lecture",
    day = "Day",
    date = "Date", 
    topic = "Topic"
  ) |>
  tab_options(
    table.font.names = "Raleway",
  )
```
